about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • Leopard 2A4 (Rank 7 Germany);

  • Premium account for 15 days;

  • 2000 Golden Eagles.

The Leopard 2A4 is one of the most renowned and widespread variants of all time, in use with numerous operators around the world thanks to its power and reliability. This particular example sports the livery of Panzerbataillon 123.

This variant features advantages across the board. It’s equipped with a 120 mm Rheinmetall cannon with access to HEAT-FS and APFSDS rounds, along with a thermal sight for the gunner. A 1500 hp engine helps push the Leopard 2 quickly over all terrain types at a max speed of 68 km/h. It offers high responsiveness and can turn and reverse quickly if you need to reposition. The turret is especially well-armored, with the cheeks being able to defeat almost all contemporary munitions.

The Leopard 2A4 is a perfectly rounded MBT, featuring impressive mobility, firepower, and survivability across the board, keeping it reliable and effective in every situation.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
Note!

This product cannot be purchased for PlayStation® or Xbox accounts!

This DLC will only be granted to the Steam account that was used to make the purchase. If you have some issues, please contact our support (login on the website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • Leopard 2A4 (Rank 7 Germany);

  • Premium account for 15 days;

  • 2000 Golden Eagles.

The Leopard 2A4 is one of the most renowned and widespread variants of all time, in use with numerous operators around the world thanks to its power and reliability. This particular example sports the livery of Panzerbataillon 123.

This variant features advantages across the board. It’s equipped with a 120 mm Rheinmetall cannon with access to HEAT-FS and APFSDS rounds, along with a thermal sight for the gunner. A 1500 hp engine helps push the Leopard 2 quickly over all terrain types at a max speed of 68 km/h. It offers high responsiveness and can turn and reverse quickly if you need to reposition. The turret is especially well-armored, with the cheeks being able to defeat almost all contemporary munitions.

The Leopard 2A4 is a perfectly rounded MBT, featuring impressive mobility, firepower, and survivability across the board, keeping it reliable and effective in every situation.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.

name: War Thunder - Leopard 2A4 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7
  • Processor:2,2 GHz
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 6XXX series or higher; AMD Radeon 1XXX series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:Dual-Core 2,4 GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 460 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 MB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

short_description: German premium Leopard 2A4, 2000 Golden Eagles, 15 days of Premium account - for grand battles at high ranks in War Thunder!
